attributes.action: Follow through on govt promises to accept 3000 child refugees.
attributes.background: The Conservative government promised the UK would accept and resettle 3000 refugee children. This week they quietly announced it would just be 350 children. We can and must do better and we call on the government to fulfill the original promise and help these children who desperately need it.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
